Pre-Game Insights: Colin Rea (Brewers) is 5-1 on the road with a 3.31 ERA in 10 starts and 12 total appearances.
Nick Martinez (Reds) has 46 strikeouts in five starts, allowing 27 earned runs and 67 hits.
The Brewers are 11th in the majors in runs scored, third in on-base percentage, and 13th in slugging.
The Reds are 15th in the majors in runs scored, 23rd in on-base percentage, and 15th in slugging.
Willy Adames, William Contreras, and Rhys Hoskins are leading hitters for the Brewers.
Spencer Steer, Elly De La Cruz, and Jonathan India are leading hitters for the Reds.
